metadata.title: CVE-2018-14469 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The IKEv1 parser in tcpdump before 4.9.3 has a buffer over-read inprint-isakmp.c:ikev1_n_print().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
